column5: I was comparing aluminum boats on-line & when comparing the Triton DV 18 Magnum with the Crestliner Fish Hawk 1850 WT I found these boats to be very similar. Does anyone know if Triton aluminum & Crestliner boats are made by the same company?
Hey Zib  You might want to try and contact Gord Hincks at hunter bay.He is a triton dealer.   [emailÂ protected]  Hope that helps. I have no idea.
Both Triton and Crestliner are units of the Brunswick group.
